head.title: World Briefing | Middle East: Gaza Strip: Abbas Says Reporter Is Alive

hedline.hl1: World Briefing | Middle East: Gaza Strip: Abbas Says Reporter Is Alive

block.p: The Palestinian president, Mahmoud Abbas, said his intelligence services had new information that confirmed that Alan Johnston, the BBC journalist kidnapped in Gaza City on March 12 and not seen since, is alive. Speaking to reporters in Stockholm, he also said he knew which group was holding Mr. Johnston.
